title: Sigmund
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, International, Fast food, Juice bar, Take-out, Israeli
description: An outside covered vegetarian diner where you primarily sit at the bar, but some tables are available. Has vegan options. Menu varies. Serves quiches, crepes, shakshuka, couscous, salads and other kosher fare. A full selection of both hot and cold drinks is offered as well; try the apple juice. Cool casual place.
